title: LoadIntValidator
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Validator of , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=MemoryInstruction.LoadInt, value=kwasm.ast.instruction.MemoryInstruction.LoadInt) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= nodes.

From the docs:


t.load memarg
  • The memory C.mems[0] must be defined in the context.
  • The alignment 2^memarg.align must not be larger than the bit width of t divided by 8.
  • Then the instruction is valid with type [i32] => [t].

t.loadN_sx memarg
  • The memory C.mems[0] must be defined in the context.
  • The alignment 2^memarg.align must not be larger than N/8.
  • Then the instruction is valid with type \[i32] => \[t].
, value=null)
